bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Method for Measurement of Weighted Peak Flutter of Sound Recording and Reproducing Equipment
IEEE Standard Method for Measurement of Weighted Peak Flutter of Sound Recording and Reproducing Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies the "weighted peak" method of measurement for predicting subjective flutter of sound recorders and reproducers for normal audio usage. For special purposes - high speed duplicators, different speeds in recording and reproducing, etc - special procedures not described here must be used.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
